text: third defendant file no/s: 6288 of 2003 division: trial division proceeding: trial originating court: supreme court of queensland delivered on: 1 july 2008 delivered at: brisbane hearing date: 16, 18-20, 23-24, 26, 30 april 2007, 1-4, 8-11, 14-18, 21-24, 28-31 may 2007, 1, 4-7, 12-14, 20 june 2007, 16-20, 23-27, 30-31 july 2007, 1-3, 6-10, 16-17, 21-24, 27-31 august 2007, 4-6, 10-12, 17 september 2007, 1, 3-5, 8 october 2007, 29-31 january 2008, 1, 4-8 february 2008, 4-5 march 2008 judge: mcmurdo j order: judgment for the first plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $22,932,881. judgment for the second plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $8,311,497. judgment for the third plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $401,392. judgment for the fifth plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $6,422,276. judgment for the sixth plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $8,445,293. judgment for the seventh plaintiff against the first defendant in the amount of $2,456,520. judgment for the plaintiffs, save for the fourth plaintiff, against the second defendant in the amount of $53,288,976. judgment for the first plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $22,834,326. judgment for the second plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $8,275,777. judgment for the third plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $399,667. judgment for the fifth plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $6,394,676. judgment for the sixth plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $8,409,000. judgment for the seventh plaintiff against the third defendant in the amount of $2,445,964. the fourth plaintiff's claim against each defendant is dismissed.  tort
